hero.title: Welcome to GDG Tacna
hero.subtitle: A community of passionate developers in Tacna, Peru
hero.description: Join us to learn, share, and build amazing things with Google technologies.

whatIsGdg.title: What is a GDG?
whatIsGdg.description: Google Developer Groups (GDG) are volunteer-driven, non-profit communities that bring together developers, students, and technology professionals interested in Google technologies and software development.
whatIsGdg.details: We organize events, workshops, technical talks, and hackathons where we share knowledge, experiences, and build projects together. We are part of a global network of over 1000 GDGs worldwide.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: Access workshops, technical talks, and educational resources about the latest Google technologies and development trends.

networking.title: Networking
networking.description: Meet and collaborate with other developers, share experiences, and create valuable professional connections.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Participate in hackathons, collaborative projects, and experiment with new technologies in a supportive environment.

whyCommunity.title: Why is Being Part of a Tech Community Important?
whyCommunity.subtitle: Belonging to a technology community goes beyond simply learning to code. It's about growing, connecting, and creating impact together.

growth.title: Accelerated Professional Growth
growth.description: Learn from others' experiences, stay updated with the latest technology trends, and develop skills you won't find in online tutorials. Knowledge sharing in a community helps you grow faster.

support.title: Support Network and Mentorship
support.description: Face technical challenges with the backing of other members. Whether you're a beginner or expert, there's always someone willing to help or learn from you. Communities create a safe space to ask questions and experiment.

opportunities.title: Opportunities and Visibility
opportunities.description: Participate in events, give talks, contribute to open source projects, and expand your professional network. Many job opportunities and collaborations are born within tech communities.

collaboration.title: Collaboration and Impact
collaboration.description: Work on projects that matter, contribute to the local tech ecosystem, and share your knowledge with others. Together we can create a positive impact in our region and beyond.

members.title: Meet Our Members
members.subtitle: The tech enthusiasts who make our community possible

upcomingEvents.title: Upcoming Events
upcomingEvents.subtitle: Don't miss our next meetups and workshops
upcomingEvents.noEvents: No upcoming events at the moment. Check back soon!

callToAction.title: Ready to Join Us?
callToAction.description: Become part of our growing community of developers and tech enthusiasts.

joinCommunity.title: Join Our Community
joinCommunity.description: Connect with us, stay updated with the latest events, share ideas, and collaborate with passionate developers from Tacna.
